works.title: Ecoactua
works.description: Ecoactua find to maintain and preserve all our naturals environments. With our help trying solve the main problems with natural resources that present in the city.

process.text1: In the process of build this application I based principally in the original idea of ecoactuar that was old idea but I want to improve and add some useful features to that. Given that information I procedure to build with someone users cases which are divided in two categories: Administrators and Users.

process.text2: Each of this can make different features in the application as shown: the create a report, and then evaluate by administrators and execute the correct process for mark a report as solved, also the administrators can use a dashboard where they can manage all of reports that the users created.

challenges.description: The challenges that founded in the build was the create a profile per user and its can manage the reports if your state no changed yet. As well I was make a effort for create the administrators dashboard and them can controlled with each one of the reports, besides the create a search which filter the searches and get information based of your attributes.

works.title: Expensify
works.description: Web application for take control and record about your personal expenses, also show you graphs for different types of expenses and which save amount of outgoings in the all month.

process.text1: In building of project I use some libraries for the different components of the application such graphs, interface, expenses, show date and filters. Also save all of records in the database for later get them and show the correct way.

process.text2: The design of graphs was divided in four tables which was: last six months, current month, per category and total with the last month. Later in the list of expenses I was some filters for show information per type of expense and category, besides I added the feature of create a new expense and the dropdown menu for filter per month.

challenges.description: In general the building the application was a challenge, because I never had make a project with hard features and manage data. But mainly was two features that I was very hard to make and I was learned a lot. First was the create graphs where I needed not only filter the information else I was manage the data the correct way. Second was the filter by type of expense and at the same time I needed to filter by category of expense all this without refresh the application. This was a interesting project because that effort me to create things that I never think  I canâ€™t make.
